description: Defines mandatory failure codes, required evidence, and remediation paths for core Axiom stages, critical for reliable Veto Gate functionality and NRALS logging (S9).

VETO_POLICY_BREACH.name: Policy Breach (Hard Stop)
VETO_POLICY_BREACH.remediation_strategy: Halt, Initiate certified rollback, Notify Governance Layer (L0)

VETO_RESOURCE_EXCESS.name: Excessive Resource Request
VETO_RESOURCE_EXCESS.remediation_strategy: Request re-computation via S2 iteration with capped limits

VETO_INSTABILITY.name: Stability Threshold Exceeded
VETO_INSTABILITY.remediation_strategy: Halt, Quarantine stage state, Initiate L1 audit.
